attachmentId.description: The UUID used for the uploaded file in blob storage

attachmentFilename.description: The original filename of the uploaded file

attachmentContentType.description: The MIME type of the uploaded file

uploadUserId.description: The UUID for the user that uploaded the file

uploadOrganisationId.description: The UUID for the organisation that the upload user is associated with

isConfirmed.description: Indicates whether user has confirmed their billing information

attachmentId.description: The UUID of the uploaded catch certificate file in blob storage

numberOfCatchCertificates.description: The total number of catch certificates on the attachment

catchCertificateId.description: The UUID of the catch certificate

flagState.description: Catch certificate flag state of catching vessel(s)

species.description: List of species imported under this catch certificate

gmsDeclarationAccepted.description: Flag to record when the GMS declaration has been accepted

consignedCountryInChargeGroup.description: Flag to record whether the consigned country is in an ipaffs charge group

totalGrossWeight.description: The total gross weight of the consignment.  It must be bigger than the total net weight of the commodities

totalNetWeight.description: The total net weight of the commodities within this consignment

totalGrossVolume.description: The total gross volume of the commodities within this consignment

totalGrossVolumeUnit.description: Unit used for specifying total gross volume of this consignment (litres or metres cubed)

numberOfPackages.description: The total number of packages within this consignment

numberOfAnimals.description: The total number of animals within this consignment

countryOfOriginIsPodCountry.description: Flag to record whether country of origin is a temporary PoD country

isLowRiskArticle72Country.description: Flag to record whether country of origin is a low risk article 72 country

consignedCountry.description: Country from where commodity was sent

uniqueComplementId.description: UUID used to match the commodityChecks to the commodityComplement

validityPeriod.description: Manually entered validity period, allowed if risk decision is INSPECTION_REQUIRED and HMI check status 'Compliant' or 'Not inspected'

uniqueComplementId.description: UUID used to match commodityComplement to its complementParameter set. CHEDPP only

complementId.description: Identifier of complement chosen from speciesFamily,speciesClass and speciesType'. This is also used to link to the complementParameterSet

complementName.description: Represents the lowest granularity - either type, class, family or species name - for the commodity selected.  This is also used to drive behaviour for EU Import journeys

eppoCode.description: EPPO Code related to plant commodities and wood packaging

isWoodPackaging.description: (Deprecated in IMTA-11832) Is this commodity wood packaging?

speciesId.description: The species ID of the commodity that is imported. Not every commodity has a species ID. This is also used to link to the complementParameterSet. The species ID can change over time

speciesCommonName.description: Species common name of commodity for IMP notification simple commodity selection

isCdsMatched.description: Has commodity been matched with corresponding CDS declaration

uniqueId.description: UUID used to match to the complement parameter set

variety.description: Name or ID of the variety

isWoody.description: Whether or not a plant is woody

indoorOutdoor.description: Indoor or Outdoor for a plant

propagation.description: Whether the propagation is considered a Plant, Bulb, Seed or None

wasSentToTradeCharge.description: Indicates whether the last applicable change was successfully send over the interface to Trade Charge

uniqueComplementId.description: UUID used to match commodityComplement to its complementParameter set. CHEDPP only

identifiers.description: Data used to identify the complements inside an IMP consignment

physicalCheckOtherText.description: Other reason to not do physical check

agent.description: Name of agent representing designated contact

newSealNumber.description: When the containers are resealed they need new seal numbers

iuuFishingReference.description: Illegal, Unreported and Unregulated (IUU) fishing reference number

iuuCheckRequired.description: Was Illegal, Unreported and Unregulated (IUU) check required

notAcceptableDestructionReason.description: Filled when notAcceptableAction is equal to destruction

notAcceptableActionOtherReason.description: Filled when notAcceptableAction is equal to other

notAcceptableActionByDate.description: Filled when consignmentAcceptable is set to false

chedppNotAcceptableReasons.description: List of details for individual chedpp not acceptable reasons

notAcceptableReasons.description: If the consignment was not accepted what was the reason

notAcceptableCountry.description: 2 digits ISO code of country (not acceptable country can be empty)

notAcceptableEstablishment.description: Filled if consignmentAcceptable is set to false

notAcceptableOtherReason.description: Filled if consignmentAcceptable is set to false

temporaryDeadline.description: Deadline when consignment has to leave borders

transhipmentEuOrThirdCountry.description: Is it transshipped to EU or third country (values EU / country name)

countryOfReDispatching.description: Two letter ISO code for country of re-dispatching

exitBip.description: Exit BIP (where consignment will leave the country)

ipaffsId.description: The unique identifier of this organisation

approvalNumber.description: Approval Number which identifies an Economic Operator unambiguously per type of organisation per country.

otherIdentifier.description: Optional Business General Number, often named Aggregation Code, which identifies an Economic Operator.

tracesId.description: Traces Id of the economic operator generated by IPAFFS

reference.description: Reference which is added to the notification when either sent to the downstream system or received from it

exactMatch.description: Details whether there's an exact match between the external source and IPAFFS data

verifiedByImporter.description: Details whether an importer has verified the data from an external source

verifiedByInspector.description: Details whether an inspector has verified the data from an external source

consignmentNoArrivalReason.description: Reason for consignment not arriving at the entry point

speciesNumber.description: Number used to identify which item the identifiers are related to

data.description: List of identifiers and their keys

isPlaceOfDestinationThePermanentAddress.description: Is the place of destination the permanent address?

numberOfDeadAnimals.description: Number of dead animals specified by units

numberOfDeadAnimalsUnit.description: Unit used for specifying number of dead animals (percent or units)

numberOfUnfitAnimalsUnit.description: Unit used for specifying number of unfit animals (percent or units)

reason.description: Reason for the status if applicable

otherReason.description: Other reason text when selected reason is 'Other'

isSelectedForChecks.description: Has commodity been selected for checks?

hasChecksComplete.description: Has commodity completed this type of check

overriddenOn.description: The time the risk decision is overridden

riskLevelDateTime.description: The date and time the risk level has been set for a notification

labTestCreatedDate.description: Date of lab test created in IPAFFS

singleLaboratoryTests.description: List of details of individual tests performed or to be performed

containsWoodPackaging.description: (Deprecated in IMTA-11832) Does the consignment contain wood packaging?

consignmentArrived.description: Has the consignment arrived at the BCP?

importingFromCharity.description: Is the importer importing from a charity?

isPlaceOfDestinationThePermanentAddress.description: Is the place of destination the permanent address?

pointOfEntry.description: Either a Border-Inspection-Post or Designated-Point-Of-Entry, e.g. GBFXT1

pointOfEntryControlPoint.description: A control point at the point of entry

transporterDetailsRequired.description: Are transporter details required for this consignment

estimatedJourneyTimeInMinutes.description: Estimated journey time in minutes to point of entry

responsibleForTransport.description: (Deprecated in IMTA-12139) Person who is responsible for transport

importerLocalReferenceNumber.description: Reference number added by the importer

sealsContainers.description: Array that contains pair of seal number and container number

submissionDate.description: Date and time when the notification was submitted

complexCommoditySelected.description: Was complex commodity selected. Indicating if importer provided commodity code.

portOfEntry.description: Entry port for EU Import notification.

portOfExit.description: Exit Port for EU Import Notification.

portOfExitDate.description: Date of Port Exit for EU Import Notification.

nominatedContacts.description: List of nominated contacts to receive text and email notifications

originalEstimatedDateTime.description: Original estimated date time of arrival

isChargeable.description: Indicates whether CUC applies to the notification

wasChargeable.description: Indicates whether CUC previously applied to the notification

resealedContainers.description: (Deprecated - To be removed as part of IMTA-6256) Resealed containers information details

signedOnBehalfOf.description: Part 2 - Sometimes other user can sign decision on behalf of another user

checkDate.description: User entered date when the checks were completed

phsiAutoCleared.description: Have the PHSI regulated commodities been auto cleared?

hmiAutoCleared.description: Have the HMI regulated commodities been auto cleared?

documentCheck.description: Whether or not a documentary check is required for PHSI

identityCheck.description: Whether or not an identity check is required for PHSI

physicalCheck.description: Whether or not a physical check is required for PHSI

conformsToEU.description: Does consignment conforms to UK laws

thirdCountryTranshipment.description: Country that consignment is transshipped through

regNumber.description: There are 3 types of registration number based on the purpose of consignment. Customs registration number, Free zone registration number and Shipping supplier registration number.

thirdCountry.description: Country to which consignment is transited

transitThirdCountries.description: Countries that consignment is transited through

exitDate.description: Exit date when import or admission

estimatedArrivalDateAtPortOfExit.description: Estimated date at port of exit

estimatedArrivalTimeAtPortOfExit.description: Estimated time at port of exit

dateTimeOfCheck.description: date and time of seal check

commodityCode.description: Commodity code for which lab test was ordered

speciesId.description: Species id of commodity for which lab test was ordered

validReferenceNumber.description: Reference number of the valid split consignment

rejectedReferenceNumber.description: Reference number of the rejected split consignment

establishmentsOfOrigins.description: List of establishments which were approved by UK to issue veterinary documents

ipaffsId.description: The IPAFFS ID number for this notification.

externalReferences.description: List of external references, which relate to downstream services

lastUpdated.description: Date when the notification was last updated.

replaces.description: Reference number of notification that was replaced by this one

replacedBy.description: Reference number of notification that replaced this one

childNotification.description: Is this notification a child of a split consignment?

isHighRiskEuImport.description: Is this notification a high risk notification from the EU/EEA?

decisionDate.description: Date when the notification was validated or rejected

agencyOrganisationId.description: Organisation id which the agent user belongs to, stored against each notification which has been raised on behalf of another organisation

riskDecisionLockingTime.description: Date and Time when risk decision was locked

isBulkUploadInProgress.description: Boolean flag that indicates whether a bulk upload is in progress

requestId.description: Request UUID to trace bulk upload

isCdsFullMatched.description: Have all commodities been matched with corresponding CDS declaration(s)

chedTypeVersion.description: The version of the ched type the notification was created with

isGmrMatched.description: Indicates whether a CHED has been matched with a GVMS GMR via DMP
